entry.title: Headbands
entry.summary:
Vendor: UPAVIM, Guatemala
Type: each
Price: 8.00

One size fits all.

 

  UPAVIM, Guatemala

UPAVIM is a group of 65 marginalized women artisans living near Guatemala City. Fair Trade sales provide sustainable incomes, a medical and dental clinic, an elementary school and daycare, 625 school scholarships, and much more. FTF member.

entry.title: Candleholder
entry.summary:
Vendor: UPAVIM, Guatemala
Type: each
Price: 12.00

These cute terracotta pieces are made from the riverbed clay of the Chenautla area of Guatemala. Families sculpt each piece by hand, dry it in the sun, paint it with a red clay slip, polish it, and then finally fire it. The firing process involves placing the objects on a grate above a pine bark fire with a covering of grass for 2-3 hours. The occasional unique black spot can sometimes be found on the piece and is a tribute to this ancient firing process. Angel, Elephant, Owl or Dove. * Note Dove candleholder is actually for larger tapers but with some ingenuity it will work with the smaller tapers as well.

These hand-dipped candles are made from the seed of the Arrayán tree in the cloud rainforest of Guatemala by the indigenous Mayan Q’ eychi’ women. The seeds are collected and heated into wax, providing a natural alternative to synthetic candles and a source of income to supplement their subsistence farming. With outside income they are less inclined to slash and burn the rainforest to grow crops. Arrayán candles are an ancient tradition, used by the Mayans to ask the God of the Mountain for health, money, work, and abundance of crops. The scent and light of these candles are said to bring together the Oxlaju Tzull Taq’a (the 13 Sacred Mountains). Handmade in Guatemala by Luz de Bosque, UPAVIM.

﻿Click the link to have a visit http://ecoquetzal.org/handicraft.php 

10 SMALL TAPER RAINFOREST CANDLES 

No drip, approx. 90 mins. burn time per candle.

15 cm H

  UPAVIM, Guatemala

UPAVIM is a group of 65 marginalized women artisans living near Guatemala City. Fair Trade sales provide sustainable incomes, a medical and dental clinic, an elementary school and daycare, 625 school scholarships, and much more. FTF member.

entry.title: Butterfly Angel Ornament
entry.summary:
Vendor: UPAVIM, Guatemala
Type: each
Price: 5.95

These eco-friendly butterfly angel ornaments are handmade and Fair Trade. Their wings are made from recycled aluminum soda cans and they're outfitted in hand-woven Guatemalan fabric. Each sold separately. 2 1/2" W (wingspan) 2 1/2"H 100% Recycled Aluminum Wings 100% Cotton Fabric Assorted Colours - White, Yellow, Blue, Red, Green

15 cm H

  UPAVIM, Guatemala

UPAVIM is a group of 65 marginalized women artisans living near Guatemala City. Fair Trade sales provide sustainable incomes, a medical and dental clinic, an elementary school and daycare, 625 school scholarships, and much more. FTF member.

entry.title: Finger Pin Cushion
entry.summary:
Vendor: UPAVIM, Guatemala
Type: each
Price: 3.95

If you sew, you know how handy it is to have your pins nearby. With this surprisingly comfortable finger pin cushion, you won’t even have to reach. Made from cotton scraps and a  upcycled plastic bottle cap. Handmade in Guatemala by UPAVIM Crafts.  

 

  UPAVIM, Guatemala

UPAVIM is a group of 65 marginalized women artisans living near Guatemala City. Fair Trade sales provide sustainable incomes, a medical and dental clinic, an elementary school and daycare, 625 school scholarships, and much more. FTF member.

entry.title: Hacky Sacks
entry.summary:
Vendor: UPAVIM, Guatemala
Type: each
Price: 8.95

These handmade Hacky Sacks are great for kicking, juggling, tossing or just hanging around your house. Crocheted by the women of UPAVIM, choose from peace, soccer or original design. Makes a great back-to-school or any time gift! Handmade. 100% cotton. 5 cm h x 5 cm w Handmade in Guatemala by UPAVIM Crafts.  

 

  UPAVIM, Guatemala

UPAVIM is a group of 65 marginalized women artisans living near Guatemala City. Fair Trade sales provide sustainable incomes, a medical and dental clinic, an elementary school and daycare, 625 school scholarships, and much more. FTF member.

entry.title: Snowman & Christmas Tree Garland
entry.summary:
Vendor: UPAVIM, Guatemala
Type: each
Price: 19.95

Back in stock mid-November 2020. These cheerful Guatemalan snowmen add a festive touch to your home. Two stuffed, felted snowmen trimmed with Guatemalan fabric accents and three stuffed, felted Christmas trees are are strung on a sparkly beaded garland with hanging loops at both ends. The garland measures 52" L. The snowman and trees are approx. 4" H and the trees hearts are 3" W. Handmade and fair trade. Garland: 52"L Glass and plastic sparkly beads, bead eyes and Guatemalan fabric accents. Handmade and Fair Trade!

  UPAVIM, Guatemala

UPAVIM is a group of 65 marginalized women artisans living near Guatemala City. Fair Trade sales provide sustainable incomes, a medical and dental clinic, an elementary school and daycare, 625 school scholarships, and much more. FTF member.

entry.title: Heart Garland
entry.summary:
Vendor: UPAVIM, Guatemala
Type: each
Price: 16.00

Love is in the air - literally! Make your home (and hearts) festive on Valentine's Day or every day with our reversible String of Hearts Garland that is sure to liven up any room! Each heart is made from traditional Guatemalan fabric and they all hang from a satin cord. As always, Handmade and Fair Trade!

  • Garland is 56" L
  • Hearts are 3" W x 3" H
  • 100% Cotton

15 cm H

  UPAVIM, Guatemala

UPAVIM is a group of 65 marginalized women artisans living near Guatemala City. Fair Trade sales provide sustainable incomes, a medical and dental clinic, an elementary school and daycare, 625 school scholarships, and much more. FTF member.

entry.title: Mayan Family Playset
entry.summary:
Vendor: UPAVIM, Guatemala
Type: 10 pk
Price: 12.95

Made from scrap cotton fabric. A fun cultural toy for kids to experience Guatemalan life. Includes the whole family: mother, father, sister, and a baby in a bassinet, along with various household items (10 pieces). Handy drawstring bag for easy cleanup. Handmade.

Dolls10cmtall; bag:10cmWx14H  Handmade in Guatemala by UPAVIM Crafts.  

 

  UPAVIM, Guatemala

UPAVIM is a group of 65 marginalized women artisans living near Guatemala City. Fair Trade sales provide sustainable incomes, a medical and dental clinic, an elementary school and daycare, 625 school scholarships, and much more. FTF member.

entry.title: Worry Dolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: UPAVIM, Guatemala
Type: 10 pk
Price: 5.95

Set of 10 handmade dolls, with drawstring cotton bag for safekeeping. A classic, made from wire and scrap fabric. According to Guatemalan legend, when children go to bed at night, they tell one of their worries to each doll and then place them under their pillow. In the morning the dolls have taken their worries away. (Works for adults too!). Handmade in Guatemala by UPAVIM Crafts.  

6cm W x 8 H (dolls 2–4cm tall)

  UPAVIM, Guatemala

UPAVIM is a group of 65 marginalized women artisans living near Guatemala City. Fair Trade sales provide sustainable incomes, a medical and dental clinic, an elementary school and daycare, 625 school scholarships, and much more. FTF member.
